QuestData.Title: Blood on the Sand
QuestData.Description: Our objective in the Twilight Highlands is to storm the Bastion of Twilight, but the Alliance have decided to make war.$B$BSo we will give them war!$B$BSlay their marines until the lesson is learned.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Highbank Marines on the Twilight Shores in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: How goes the defense of our beach head?
QuestData.RewardText: Good, good. Let them reap what they sow!
